metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Zumbo Pumbo - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group1_Prisoner1_18991627-0e38-44d0-a8ac-31e1105d5392 in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to Zumbo Pumbo

0.speaker: Zumbo Pumbo
0.text: Listen pal, only a special sort could'a done what you did. Thank you.

1.speaker: Zumbo Pumbo
1.text: Aye, youse have my gratitude. Truly.
